Apple___Apple_scab.name: Apple Scab
Apple___Apple_scab.description: A fungal disease that causes dark, scaly lesions on apple tree leaves and fruit.
treatments: Apply fungicide early in the growing season
Ensure good air circulation by proper pruning
Clean up fallen leaves and fruit in autumn

Apple___Black_rot.name: Black Rot
Apple___Black_rot.description: A fungal disease affecting apples, causing leaf spots and fruit rot.
treatments: Prune out dead or diseased wood

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.name: Cedar Apple Rust
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.description: A fungal disease requiring both apple and cedar trees to complete its life cycle.
treatments: Remove nearby cedar trees if possible

Apple___healthy.name: Healthy Apple Tree
Apple___healthy.description: The plant appears healthy with no visible signs of disease.

Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot.name: Corn Cercospora Leaf Spot
Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot.description: A fungal disease causing small, circular spots on corn leaves.

Corn___Common_rust.name: Common Corn Rust
Corn___Common_rust.description: A fungal disease causing reddish-brown pustules on leaves.

Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.name: Northern Corn Leaf Blight
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.description: A fungal disease causing long, cigar-shaped lesions on leaves.

Corn___healthy.name: Healthy Corn
Corn___healthy.description: The plant appears healthy with no visible signs of disease.

Potato___Early_blight.name: Potato Early Blight
Potato___Early_blight.description: A fungal disease causing dark brown spots with concentric rings on leaves.

Potato___Late_blight.name: Potato Late Blight
Potato___Late_blight.description: A devastating disease causing water-soaked spots and white fuzzy growth.

Potato___healthy.name: Healthy Potato Plant
Potato___healthy.description: The plant appears healthy with no visible signs of disease.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.name: Tomato Bacterial Spot
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.description: A bacterial disease causing small, dark spots on leaves and fruit.

Tomato___Early_blight.name: Tomato Early Blight
Tomato___Early_blight.description: A fungal disease causing dark spots with concentric rings on leaves.

Tomato___Late_blight.name: Tomato Late Blight
Tomato___Late_blight.description: A serious disease causing large, dark blotches on leaves and fruit rot.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.name: Tomato Leaf Mold
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.description: A fungal disease causing yellow spots on upper leaf surfaces and olive-green mold below.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.name: Septoria Leaf Spot
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.description: A fungal disease causing small, circular spots with dark borders on leaves.

Tomato___Spider_mites.name: Spider Mites
Tomato___Spider_mites.description: Tiny pests causing stippling on leaves and fine webbing.

Tomato___Target_Spot.name: Target Spot
Tomato___Target_Spot.description: A fungal disease causing circular spots with concentric rings.

Tomato___Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.name: Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl Virus
Tomato___Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.description: A viral disease causing yellowing and curling of leaves, stunted growth.

Tomato___healthy.description: The plant appears healthy with no visible signs of disease.
